controller

Class SuggerimentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SuggerimentController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE})
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/suggeriment")
public class SuggerimentController
extends Object

    Author:
